posts.excerpt:
I have finally got my invitation to try the new text editor Atom.io. Atom is built with web technologies (node.js in it’s core) by the folks at GitHub and it’s somewhat very similar to the famous SublimeText.
In my opinion it seems very promising (even if it’s significantly slower than SublimeText), anyway I have to try it a lot more before shaping a serious opinion about it.  The point of this topic is that Atom.io is currently in closed beta and I have received 3 invitations to share with whom is willing…
